info.title: Assetstracker API docs

post.description: Endpoint to signup a new user/agent.

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: User/Agent userName to signup (has to be unique)

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User/Agent email to signup (has to be unique)

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Enter a valid password to signup

422.description: Validation Failed / User exists with same email or username

post.summary: Login a User/Agent into the application.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User/Agent email to login into the application.

200.description: Login Successful. Will return the user object and an JWT token for further requests

422.description: Validation Failed / User doesn't exist with same email / password.

post.summary: Agent can create a client under his account
post.description: Agent can create a client with his agentId mentioned in that user. If the logged in user is not an agent, the application will return an error.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: User's firstName that the agent is trying to add.

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: User's lastName that the agent is trying to add.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User's email that the agent is trying to add ( has to be unique ). Username will be created from this email only using the alphabets before @ symbol. Password will also be same as username

parameters.name: mobileNumber
parameters.description: Mobile number for the agent's client.

200.description: Login Successful. Will return the user object and an JWT token for further requests

422.description: Validation Failed / User doesn't exist with same email / password.
